record.description: Students of thirty nationalities will present the seventh annual International Night Carnival next Friday and Saturday at University of Chicago International House. Exhibits, a Chinese bazaar, a variety show, and parade of nations will be features of the carnival. Finding their place in the world are, left to right: Hook Young of Hilo, Territory of Hawaii; Gertrude Ascher of Vienna, Austria; Anna Chung of Pyongyang, Korea, and Librado del Castillo of Pangasinan, Philippine Islands.
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
